listitem.para: August 19, 2006
[ken] - log the results of 'make check' in glibc multilib.
August 13, 2006
[ken] - Add check to 32-bit bzip2, thanks to Jonathan Davis.
August 9, 2006
[Chris] - Reversed order in which GRUB patches are applied (fixes ticket #84).
August 6, 2006
[ken] - Fix accidental breakage in the 64-bit libtool text. This fixes ticket #83.
August 3, 2006
[ken] - Fix the testsuite sed for 64-bit gettext. This fixes ticket #80, thanks to Jonathan Davis for the initial report and Go Moko for the initial analysis.
[ken] - Add an LDEMULATION when we run the 32-bit libtool testsuite.
[ken] - Fix the locale failures in 32-bit glibc tests, thanks to Go Moko.
[jim] - Added Grub use mmap patch to x86_64.
July 4, 2006
[jim] - Added x86 Grub disk geometry patch to x86_64.
December 09, 2005
[ken] - Set prefix to '/' in multilib module-init-tools, to prevent man pages going into /share.
[ken] - Simplify the installation of multilib bzip2. Thanks to Go Moko.
December 03, 2005
[ken] - Reinstate the sed to nullify certain 64-bit gettext tests.
November 15, 2005
[ken] - Correct temporary perl instructions to actually install perl. Thanks to Harri K. Tikkala. Fix text for number of directories to add to ld.so.conf - Thanks to Go Moko.
November 11, 2005
[ken] - Reduce temporary perl to a single 32-bit install.
November 10, 2005
[jim] - Added missing -host to Grub in chatper 7. Thank you G. Moko.
November 2, 2005
[jim] - Fixed type on kernel page. Had TARGET should of been CLFS_TARGET.
October 31, 2005
[jim] - Now an official project. Resetting all Changelogs.
